name: Builder
slogan: Welcome to the future of building software
description:
Our platform empowers anyone with an idea and no know-how create and operate the lifecycle of any bespoke digital project with our 3 products, including: 

1. Builder. Builder is an online assembly-line platform that uses AI, a marketplace of building blocks and a marketplace of teams (sourced from the capacity network of 75,000+ technical and creative resources from 132 dev shops [as of May 2019]) to build tailor-made software.

2. BuilderCare. BuilderCare guarantees your bespoke software stays up-to-date. This ensures projects run smoothly post-launch, and continue after third-party libraries such as Facebook APIs are updated. 

3. CloudOps. CloudOps leverages artificial intelligence and machine learning to optimize the management and expenses of cloud infrastructure. The result: a single, discounted bill for all other services.

jobs.title: Capacity Operations lead (PMO)
jobs.description:
Capacity Operations lead (PMO)

Gurugram, Haryana, India ·

DESCRIPTION

We are looking for a versatile & organized go-getter to help us manage the supply side of the platform for engineer.ai. We are on an ambitious pursuit the build the largest distributing engineering team in the world, you would engage with capacity partners (software development companies) to drive great outcomes for partners and delivery teams.

Key areas of delivery:

* Ensuring supply is always ahead of demand on the platform (Planning)
* On-boarding new partners and creators on the platform (Onboarding)
* Track demand from delivery team and match with available capacity (Matching)
* Ensure timely payments for Invoices (Payment)
* Deliver high capacity partner NPS

REQUIREMENTS
* Candidate should have experience of working in the software development ecosystem. PMO / Project management experience is preferred.
* Good cross functional and external stakeholder management skills.
* Have significant knowledge of software development companies’ business models.
* Should have a broad understanding of business, cost structures and product prototype

Why You Should Join

Our culture is a cross between serious business and quirky startup; as we’ve grown from $0.5m to $45m in less than 4 years. We want team players who roll up their sleeves, are open to being challenged and also understand the importance of respect, integrity and can that balance that with irreverence, cheekiness and a brand that aspires to do away with the taboo of being a “boring” software company. Most importantly, any role in Engineer.ai is like joining our family.

jobs.title: Customer Product Expert
jobs.description:
Customer product expert (CPE) is a part of the delivery team. In partnership with CTE, this role is the key stakeholder for taking a project from Design to Delivery. These experts play the role of the product advisor to the customer, converts the requirements into a project plan and works with developers in the capacity network to deliver the project.  Senior CPE will lead a team of 8-10 CPEs

Key areas of delivery:

On time delivery of the project (as per build card)
Deliver customer satisfaction
Expert recommendations for key sectors 
Upsell market place services
Build science and logic for the accuracy of project plans

jobs.title: Customer Technical Expert
jobs.description:
We are looking for a versatile & out of box innovator who will be at the forefront of cutting edge

AI technology that is disrupting a combined $800 billion (and growing) industry for software build

and operate services, selling into both the B2C and B2B markets. The Customer Technical

Expert (CTE) will champion all technical aspects of client’s projects from Ideation and Technical

Architecture to Execution and Delivery. Our selection process will emphasize hands-on software

engineering and architecture skills as well as execution and organizational skills equally. The

ideal candidate must be a master of the engineering domain, be senior level hands-on expert in

at least one of the following technologies (Ruby, Angular, iOS Swift or Android Java) and be

able to contribute as an individual contributor (software engineer and architect) at least a third of

the time. These experts play the role of the lead product technologist to the customer.

Why We Need This Role

Customer Technical Expert (CTE) will help us implement customer projects that are robust in

development and technically sound. CTE will partner with Customer Product Expert (CPE) to

work with the creators from the supply network to ensure that the code development and

architecture is robust - that will allow CPE to deliver customer projects with minimised bugs and

architecture that allows easy scalability. Why You Should Join

This role will give you an experience of working on a plethora of bespoke software development

projects delivered from an aggregated creator network. This role will give you an experience of

delivering technical expertise at scale while maintaining a high level of hands-on software

development craft as well as an opportunity to help build a programmatic model of working with

a large aggregated network. Combination of both will be a unique experience and a specialised

skill set in the new world of business and technical models.

First Six Month Deliverables

● On time delivery of the project (as per build card)

● Code reusability

● Code quality - number of bugs in 90 days post shipment

● Customer tech team satisfaction feedback (where applicable)

● CP Network Rating

Requirements

Passionate about loosely held values and ideas. We want someone who has experience

but is not blinded by the path already taken.

● 8 plus years solid experience with wide range of web and mobile technologies.

● Mastery of at least one of the following languages in a cloud based ecosystem:

○ Ruby

○ Angular

○ iOS (Swift)

○ Android (Java)

● 4 plus years solid experience as a technical lead, including at least 2 years in large scale

product environment

● A proven track record of senior level software engineering and architecture

accomplishments in a high-capacity, large-scale, internet-based product platform

● Comfortable leading a team of capacity partner network based (i.e. outsourced and

offshored) engineers capable of working on projects and at scale unlike any other

they've encountered

● Solid procedural and object oriented Software Engineering fundamentals. Strong

understanding of and experience with code review tools and practices

● Strong understanding of and experience with testing practices

● Strong automation and CI / CD experience. Pivotal Tracker or Jira, Docker, CI/CD,

GitHub tools experience, some would say you are a master.

Benefits

● Performance-based bonuses

● Health benefits

● A collaborative culture where unconventional thinkers come together to solve interesting

problems and having fun while doing it

● Mission-driven company that is making the world a better place

jobs.title: Data Scientist
jobs.description:
Why we need this role

We are looking for a Data Scientist to join our newly established and fast-paced Growth team at a stage where you can really make a difference. We plan to run hundreds of performance marketing campaigns globally as well as to increase our in-product conversion and k factor and we need someone to use advanced data science to execute and optimize our global performance and content marketing.

Why you should join

This is an exciting opportunity to join a Growth team in its early stage - therefore we are looking for someone who thrives in a fast paced environment and is proactive and thinks outside the box. The Growth team is data-driven and results focused. We are seeking a talented professional who thrives at the intersection of data, product and performance marketing. This is an amazing opportunity for someone with marketing analytics background to dive into data sets and automate, measure and optimize the effectiveness of our performance and content marketing campaigns. You will have the chance to work across all departments, supporting the constant improvement of our marketing efforts and overall business growth, as well as automating data pipelines and integrations.

First Six Month Deliverables / OKRs
* Develop and roll out multi-channel attribution model
* Strategy for SEM optimisation and customer segmentation
* Establishing A/B testing roadmap


What will you be doing?
* Using advanced data science to execute and optimize our global marketing.
* Measuring and providing optimization recommendations for marketing campaigns and improving our marketing effectiveness through experimentation
* Owning full cycle of an experiment (from data-driven hypothesis generation to test design to analysis and interpretation) while also innovating on experimental methodologies that allow us to obtain meaningful results
* Applying advanced statistical analysis and clustering algorithms to understand consumer’s behaviour across multiple channels
* Develop Marketing Mix and Promotional Pricing Models to find the most optimal spends and promotion percentages
* Develop Forecasting models to help drive scenario planning and leverage Return on Advertisement Spending
* Perform analyses on large sets of data to extract actionable insights that will help drive decisions across the user funnel – such as acquisition, activation, and retention
* Studying user behaviour, strategic initiatives, markets, content, and new features and bring data and insights into every decision we make
* Partner with Engineering to improve data source quality

Requirements

* Some experience in marketing analytics or business intelligence with a proven track record of delivering performance results required
* Strong application knowledge of Statistical and Data Mining techniques.
* Strong knowledge of SQL, BigQuery
* Working knowledge of Base SAS, SAS STAT & SAS Macros or Python, R
* Proficient with Tableau and other Data Visualization tools
* Experience in A/B and multivariate testing
* Have working experience with some of the following: Adstage, Google Ads, Facebook / Instagram Ads, LinkedIn Ads, Zoho/Hubspot, Salesforce
* Working experience with 3rd-party tracking vendors and integrating with social platforms.
* You will have the ability to interpret complex data sets and come up with actionable recommendations
* Good technical and analytical communication skills
* Commercially minded and always thinking of the customers' current and future needs
* You live and breathe data, and can use it to help teams make the right decisions
* Are excited by technology and will enjoy working in the fast pace of a start-up.
* Are passionate about loosely held values and ideas. We want someone who has experience but is not blinded by the path already taken.

Benefits

* Performance-based bonuses and stock options
* Generous vacation and time off benefits including paid holidays
* Generally flexible working hours
* A collaborative culture where unconventional thinkers come together to solve interesting problems and having fun while doing it
* Mission-driven company that is making the world a better place
* Healthcare package coming soon

jobs.title: Director of Talent Acquisition - Asia Pacific
jobs.description:
We are looking for a networking master, brand evangelist, and deal closer to join our Human Capital team as a Head of Talent Acquisition for our team in India. We’re growing fast so we need someone who feels connected to our company’s value system, build meaningful relationships with candidates, and uses their exceptional follow up skills to get great talent on to our teams.


Why We Need This Role

We are growing our technical team’s headcount rapidly this year and it’s the recruiting team who sets the tone. We need a strong leader of technical recruiting team to identify experts who align with our values and move them carefully yet quickly through the funnel so that we’re putting the right people into the right places. It’s our people who deliver results for our company and it’s our recruiters who work in partnership with our hiring managers to build those teams.


Why You Should Join

This is a challenging role that will test your ability to identify a high volume of scarce talent in a hot market for a collaborative, disruptive, and growing company. You’ll be tasked with hitting the ground running but you’ll get to see the immediate results of your hard work with not only the amazing colleagues that you bring on but with the results that we’re able to achieve as a team. You’ll be encouraged to work autonomously like an entrepreneur and we’ll make sure you have the tools you need to be successful - Innovation and thinking differently is welcome here!


First Six Month Deliverables

* Streamline 100% of job descriptions, performance objectives, scorecard questions
* Hit agreed-upon hiring targets for your location
* Hit SLAs for Average Time to Fill
* Deliver exceptional candidate experiences as they navigate through the funnel
* Implement strategies which positively impact Cost per Hire with a large % of hiring using unconventional methods (not 3rd party recruiters)
* Hire right as measured by 90 Day Turn Over

Requirements

* Passionate about loosely held values and ideas. We want someone who has experience but is not blinded by the path already taken
* Proven leader who can motivate and inspire a recruiting team to achieve a balance of hitting rapid growth targets while maintaining candidate quality
* Experience recruiting Engineering Leads, Technical Leads, Technical Product Managers, Software Engineers (front-end, back-end, and mobile) who have experience using our tech stack
* Ability to maintain a thorough understanding of the employment landscape, specifically in the tech scene, which you use to implement smart recruiting strategies
* You are a dynamic and influential storyteller who excels in the art of pitching and closing candidates
* You drive additional value when recruiting via smart networking strategies
* You push boundaries of conventional thinking by exploring new methodologies to take the organization to the next level
* Process orientated with an aptitude for building out workflows and/or communication schedules that work across time zones for both candidates and hiring managers
* Experience in building end-to-end processes which improve candidate experience, time to fill, cost per hire, and overall efficiency in a high volume recruiting environment
* You are a disruptive yet calculated risk taker who challenges loosely held ideas to achieve better results
* Expertise in data-driven decision making in a recruiting environment. You prefer making decisions based on deep analysis when it comes to evaluating sales achievements and course correcting

Benefits

* Health and Wellness benefits
* Performance-based bonuses and stock options
* Generous vacation and time off benefits including paid holidays
* A collaborative culture where unconventional thinkers come together to solve interesting problems and having fun while doing it
* Mission-driven company that is making the world a better place

jobs.title: Engineering Lead
jobs.description:
We’re looking for humble, but ambitious, razor-sharp Engineering Leader who can teach us a thing or two. We promise to return the favor. Like us, you take product development, API, Analytics and ML or AI platform engineering seriously; you’re passionate about technology and, even more so, about leadership. We embrace those who see things differently, aren’t afraid to experiment, and who have a healthy disregard for constraints. That’s where you come in. We are currently seeking an Engineering Leader to drive technical vision and provide leadership for multiple teams of engineers and other creators in an innovative and fast paced environment. Our selection process will emphasize technical and architectural skills as well as leadership/management/SDLC process/organizational skills equally. The ideal candidate must be a master of their domain. Furthermore, the ideal candidate must be able to inspire, champion and teach when the need arises. We are looking for someone who’s is equally comfortable leading by influence or authority. Lastly, we are looking for a rare mix of intelligence, integrity, domain knowledge, verbal agility, and diplomacy which allows you to rapidly earn the trust of technically astute engineers and product astute product management leaders.


Why We Need This Role

We are looking for a leader to help us build out a portal of tools, services and workflows that our Capacity Partners will leverage as they establish and manage their respective partnerships with us and help us turn client’s ideas into a fully functioning software. This includes everything from partner client contract execution to dashboards as well as creator assessment and onboarding tools and tools that allow partners to manage rates or availability of their respective creators. We want to do this to enable our partners to leapfrog their fiscal and operational efficiency as well as their stickiness with us.


Why You Should Join

This is a challenging and diverse role that requires you to build both, an organization and new generation of Builder product, nearly from the ground up. Only join this role if you are craving rapid growth, able to create a path in unchartered territory, and comfortable with trying, failing and course-correcting fast.


First Six Month Deliverables

* Develop and execute strategy for horizontally scalable development of Builder Hive
** Transform Builder Hive into modularized application which can be maintained and grown semi-autonomously
** Grow / transform Builder Hive team to be capable of parallelized (a minimum of 4 largely autonomous teams) development efforts

* Significantly streamline creator’s onboarding and assessment tools and workflows
* Achieve greater level of quality and fault tolerance through the implementation of hard enforced CI/CD automation, containerization and pipelines & IDE creation and orchestration for all projects / teams

Requirements

* Passionate about loosely held values and ideas. We want someone who has experience but is not blinded by the path already taken.
* 10 plus years solid experience in back end open source based technologies, including at least 4 - 5 years in Ruby or RoR cloud based ecosystems
* 4 plus years solid experience as a technical lead, including at least 2 years in large scale platform environment
* CS degree required or equivalent work experience
* Solid procedural and object oriented Software Engineering fundamentals
* 3 plus years of relevant experience managing fast-paced and dynamic Scrum team
* A proven track record of senior level software engineering and architecture accomplishments in a high-capacity, large-scale, internet-based product platform
* Capable of technical deep-dives, yet verbally and cognitively agile enough to hold their own in a strategy discussion with senior technical or product leadership
* Comfortable recruiting a team of very bright, experienced engineers capable of working on projects and at scale unlike any other they've encountered
* Very experienced with Agile / Scrum methodologies
* Outstanding communication skills, both written and oral
* Expert understanding of RoR framework

* Solid understanding of AWS services
* Solid experience with containerized applications and serverless functions

* Strong understanding of and experience with testing practices
* Strong automation and CI / CD experience
* Pivotal Tracker or Jira, Docker, CI/CD, GitHub tools experience, some would say you are a master

* Some experience collaborating with ML/AI teams
* Experience in data-driven environments

Benefits

* Health and Wellness benefits including competitive medical, dental, and vision plans
* Performance-based bonuses and stock options
* Generous vacation and time off benefits including paid holidays
* Generally flexible working hours
* Working in a beautiful office space the heart of Silicon Beach in Playa Vista
* A collaborative culture where unconventional thinkers come together to solve interesting problems and having fun while doing it
* Mission-driven company that is making the world a better place

jobs.title: Engineering Lead (vCloud)
jobs.description:
We’re looking for humble, but ambitious, razor-sharp Engineering Leader who can teach us a thing or two. We promise to return the favor. Like us, you take product development, API, Analytics and ML or AI platform engineering seriously; you’re passionate about technology and, even more so, about leadership. We embrace those who see things differently, aren’t afraid to experiment, and who have a healthy disregard for constraints. That’s where you come in. We are currently seeking an Engineering Leader to drive technical vision and provide leadership for multiple teams of engineers and other creators in an innovative and fast paced environment. Our selection process will emphasize technical and architectural skills as well as leadership/management/SDLC process/organizational skills equally. The ideal candidate must be a master of their domain. Furthermore, the ideal candidate must be able to inspire, champion and teach when the need arises. We are looking for someone who is equally comfortable leading by influence or authority. Last, we are looking for a rare mix of intelligence, integrity, domain knowledge, verbal agility, and diplomacy which allows you to rapidly earn the trust of technically astute engineers and product astute product management leaders.

Why We Need This Role

We are looking for a leader to help us build out our vCloud platform that allows customers to leverage the services of multiple cloud providers, will still being cost effective. This includes real-time billing systems more accurate than those of the cloud providers themselves, a virtualized control layer to create a common API for multiple providers, as well as an infrastructure arbitration and trading system. We want to do this in order to allow our customers to get the best possible price for their infrastructure, while allowing us to deploy and manage multi-cloud infrastructure with ease.



Why You Should Join

This is a challenging and diverse role that requires you to build both, an organization and a new generation of vCloud product, on top of our existing foundation. Only join this role if you are craving rapid growth, able to create a path in unchartered territory, and comfortable with trying, failing and course-correcting fast.

First Six Month Deliverables
* Develop and execute strategy for horizontally scalable development of vCloud
** Transform vCloud into modularized application which can be maintained and grown semi-autonomously
** Grow / transform vCloud team to be capable of parallelized (a minimum of 5 largely autonomous teams) development efforts

* Significantly streamline internal billing workflows, customer onboarding, and general processes
** Increase usage accuracy to 100% and real-time to 24 hours
** Transform architecture to allow scalability to 50,000 users
** Automate key workstreams

* Achieve greater level of quality and fault tolerance through the implementation of hard enforced CI/CD automation, containerization and pipelines & IDE creation and orchestration for all projects / teams

Requirements

* Strong technical leadership experience in globally geo distributed environments
* 10 plus years solid experience in Internet Infrastructure, including at least 3 - 4 years in cloud based service powered, microservice oriented ecosystems with emphasis on big data, analytics and ML
* CS degree required or equivalent work experience
* 5 plus years of relevant experience managing multiple product, fast-paced and dynamic software engineering teams
* A proven track record of managing successful high-capacity, large-scale, internet-based product platforms/architectures
* Capable of technical deep-dives, yet verbally and cognitively agile enough to hold their own in a strategy discussion with senior technical or executive leadership
* Comfortable recruiting and leading technical leads and a global team of very bright, experienced engineers capable of working on projects and at scale unlike any other they've encountered
* Very experienced with Agile / Scrum methodologies
* Outstanding communication skills, both written and oral
* Expert understanding of object oriented and procedural Software Engineering, Data Engineering and cloud computing fundamentals
* Expert understanding of Ruby or Python
* Expert understanding of SQL and NoSQL database architecture, strong understanding of RDS and data streaming services
* Strong understanding of and experience with testing practices including unit testing, integration testing, acceptance, and load testing
* Strong automation and CI / CD experience
* Strong software and data security expertise
* Pivotal Tracker or Jira, GitHub, CD/CI tools experience, some would say you are a master.
* If I asked your previous team members about you, they would say you were a great leader and they would very much welcome an opportunity to work for you once again.

Benefits

* Performance-based bonuses and stock options
* Generous vacation and time off benefits including paid holidays
* Generally flexible working hours
* A collaborative culture where unconventional thinkers come together to solve interesting problems and having fun while doing it
* Mission-driven company that is making the world a better place

jobs.title: Engineering Lead - DevOps
jobs.description:
We’re looking for humble, but ambitious, razor-sharp DevOps leader who can teach us a thing or two. We promise to return the favor. Like us, you take product development and platform engineering seriously; you’re passionate about technology and, even more so, about leadership. We embrace those who see things differently, aren’t afraid to experiment, and who have a healthy disregard for constraints. That’s where you come in. We are currently seeking a Director of DevOps to drive technical vision and provide leadership for a group of DevOps engineers in an innovative and fast paced environment. Our selection process will emphasize technical and architectural skills as well as leadership/management/organizational skills equally. The ideal candidate must be a master of their domain in cloud based DevOps. Furthermore, the ideal candidate must be able to inspire, champion and teach when the need arises. We are looking for someone who’s is equally comfortable leading by influence or authority. Last, we are looking for a rare mix of intelligence, integrity, domain knowledge, verbal agility, and diplomacy which allows you to rapidly earn the trust of technically astute engineers and product astute product management leaders.

Why We Need This Role

We are looking for a leader to help us achieve and maintain maximum potential in areas of scale, security, fiscal efficiency and fault tolerance. This includes everything from authentication to authorization service to programmatic cross cloud resource initiation, orchestration and continuity.


Why You Should Join


This is a challenging and diverse role that requires you to build both, an organization and DevOps vision, nearly from the ground up. Only join this role if you are craving rapid growth, able to create a path in unchartered territory, and comfortable with trying, failing and course-correcting fast.


First Six Month Deliverables
* Develop and execute a DevOps strategy for Builder Platform to support product scale, orchestration and fault tolerance
** Automate creation, orchestration, auto scaling and cross-availability zone failover for the Builder platform ecosystem

* Develop and execute a DevOps strategy for Builder Platform in support of client project environments
** Automate creation, orchestration, auto scaling and cross-availability zone failover for all client applications built via the Builder platform

* Develop and execute a DevOps strategy in support of successful crosscloud service utilization and orchestration
** Automate creation and orchestration of all container based client applications leveraging VKE or similar orchestration product

Requirements

* Strong technical leadership experience in globally geo distributed environments
* 12 plus years solid experience in Internet Infrastructure, including at least 4 - 5 years in cloud based DevOps environment
* CS degree required or equivalent work experience
* 5 plus years of relevant experience managing large, fast-paced and dynamic DevOps engineering teams
* A proven track record of managing successful high-capacity, large-scale, internet-based product platforms/architectures
* Capable of technical deep-dives, networking, cloud services, yet verbally and cognitively agile enough to hold their own in a strategy discussion with senior technical or executive leadership
* Comfortable recruiting and leading technical leads and a global team of very bright, experienced engineers capable of working on projects and at scale unlike any other they've encountered
* Very experienced with Agile / Scrum methodologies
* Outstanding communication skills, both written and oral
* Expert understanding of Engineering, DevOps and cloud computing fundamentals
* Expert understanding of AWS services
* Strong automation and CI / CD experience
* Strong infrastructure security, AAA (authentication, authorization, and accounting) and secret management expertise
* Solid experience with containerized applications/orchestration and serverless functions
* Terraform, Kubernetes, GitHub, CD/CI tools experience, some would say you are a master.
* If I asked your previous team members about you, they would say you were a great leader and they would very much welcome an opportunity to work for you once again.
* Experience in high SLA environments

* Some experience working with Azure, Openstack or GCP as well as experience with ISO 27001 or SAS 70 assessments is a strong plus

Benefits

* Health and Wellness benefits including competitive medical, dental, and vision plans
* Performance-based bonuses and stock options
* Generous vacation and time off benefits including paid holidays
* Generally flexible working hours
* WeWork Paddington London
* A collaborative culture where unconventional thinkers come together to solve interesting problems and having fun while doing it
* Mission-driven company that is making the world a better place

jobs.title: Front End Software Engineer
jobs.description:
We’re looking for humble, but ambitious, razor-sharp Software Engineer, front end who can teach us a thing or two. We promise to return the favor. Like us, you take product development, UX research and platform engineering seriously; you’re passionate about technology. We embrace those who see things differently, aren’t afraid to experiment, and who have a healthy disregard for constraints. That’s where you come in. Our selection process will emphasize hands on engineering. The ideal candidate must be a master of their domain and be able to contribute as an individual contributor (software engineer and architect).


Why We Need This Role

We are looking for a software engineer, front end to help us develop our Builder Product and Enterprise Management systems visions and enable us to continue turning client’s ideas into a fully functioning software at a massive scale. The industry is in a constant state of flux; tools and frameworks change by the month and so we are looking for someone who is not afraid to learn on the job, and who can take the initiative to identify and implement novel solutions


Why You Should Join

This is a challenging and diverse role that requires you to build both, an organization and new generation of Builder product, nearly from the ground up. Only join this role if you are craving rapid growth, able to create a path in uncharted territory, and comfortable with trying, failing and course-correcting fast.


First Six Month Deliverables

* Collaborate with designers, product managers, and other software developers to deliver compelling user-facing products or enterprise wide integrations
* As a part of the engineering scrum team, contribute to the architecture of efficient and reusable components that drive complex applications across the stack
* Create integration and unit tests that enable availability and scalability
* Identify necessary tools and methods to resolve functional, performance and scalability issues

Requirements

Passionate about loosely held values and ideas. We want someone who has experience but is not blinded by the path already taken.

* 3-5 years building front end applications at scale
* Expert understanding of Angular 2.0+
* Strong understanding and experience with testing practices (TDD/BDD)
* Strong automation and CI/CD experience
* Pivotal Tracker or Jira, GitHub tools experience is a plus
* Outstanding communication skills, both written and oral

Preferred:

* Experience in working on a distributed team in an Agile environment
* Experience with Typescript, RxJS, writing elegant and scalable code

Benefits

* Health and Wellness benefits including competitive medical, dental, and vision plans
* Performance-based bonuses and stock options
* Generous vacation and time off benefits including paid holidays
* Generally flexible working hours
* Working in a beautiful office space the heart of Silicon Beach in Playa Vista
* A collaborative culture where unconventional thinkers come together to solve interesting problems and having fun while doing it
* Mission-driven company that is making the world a better place

jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description:
We are looking for a senior front-end developer that brings their own ideas to the table. This person must be well versed in AngularJS as well as have passing familiarity with other widely used frameworks. They must be detail oriented and self driven. Furthermore they must be able to inspire and mentor others when the need arises. The industry is in a constant state of flux; tools and frameworks change by the month and so we are looking for someone who is not afraid to learn on the job, and who can take the initiative to identify and implement novel solutions

* Architect efficient and reusable front-end systems that drive complex web applications
* Collaborate with Product Designers, Product Managers, and Software Engineers to deliver compelling user-facing products
* Identify and resolve performance and scalability issues.
* Develop front-end UI composition, view-model, data binding and actions
* Integrate with RESTful services with a metrics-driven API Gateway
* Write unit tests for front-end
* Proficient understanding of web markup, including HTML5, CSS3, Typescript and Javascript libraries like jQuery (Hands on experience)
* Own the UI technology stack, introduce and utilise pertinent frameworks and technologies which are scalable and flexible enough to cater to the platform’s roadmap.
* Good knowledge of UI design principles, patterns and best practices.

6 Months Deliverables:
*
* Architect efficient and reusable front-end systems that drive complex web applications
* Collaborate with designers, product managers, and other software developers to deliver compelling user-facing products
* Identify and resolve performance and scalability issues

Requirements

* 3-4 years of experience producing commercial software.
* A professional proficiency in English.
* Other people would describe you as very detail-oriented, yet you routinely make the right tradeoffs between being perfect and being productive
* Familiar with AngularJS2 & 4 and Bootstrap, and can demonstrate cases where you have built reusable MVC components and beautiful interfaces
* Write elegant, well tested code and can strike the right balance between writing perfect code and shipping it rapidly and iteratively
* Can take direction on what needs to be done, but you're self-directed and complete your work without someone looking over your shoulder
* When there is something in between you and your goal, you do what it takes to learn, solve problems, and just make things happen

Benefits

Engineer.ai is an online platform for building software using AI & a marketplace of teams. Builder takes care of everything from idea to app and CloudOps ensures that your idea stays healthy and operates efficiently in the Cloud.

Engineer.ai’s vision is to be the #1 way to Build Software and ultimately to be the connect between every idea and product; helping everyone who wants to engage in technology without needing to know how to build it.

jobs.title: Global Vice President of Human Capital
jobs.description:
Why We Need This Role

We are looking for a dynamic people and culture leader to hire, engage, and empower team members who believe in pushing the boundaries of conventional thinking, are leverage loosely held beliefs to solve problems differently, and have a passion for bringing ideas to life. We need this role to drive people-focused programs that are culture enhancing, boundary pushing, and meaningful so that we can raise the bar and be proudly recognized as a sought-after place to work. This role would build a strong foundation for our offices in Los Angeles, London, and India and would create consistency as we operate as one team across the globe.


From compensation to employee relations, hire to onboarding, and retention to administration, we need a well-rounded leader to take our people and culture operations to the next level.

Why You Should Join

If the idea of growing a company, building and then optimizing human capital operations in three global locations, and being empowered to push the boundaries of conventional thinking sounds like your dream job, then we’ve got the role for you. Travel the world, design and implement innovative human capital programs, and know that you are changing the trajectory of the company with every hire (and there will be a lot of them!).

First Six Month Deliverables
* Deeply understand our global human capital operations, systems, and processes
* Develop a strategy to align human capital programs at the three locations
* Create and implement a winning employee engagement and culture strategy
* Hit placement targets to support our growth goals across engineering, sales, delivery, marketing, and operations
* Continue the development of the human capital roadmap and execute a strategy to drive functional goals

Requirements

* Passionate about loosely held values and ideas. We want someone who has experience but is not blinded by the path already taken.
* Human Capital leadership experience in a tech start-up or high-growth environment; you’ve lead scaling from <100 people and need to be both strategic and hands on
* Experience leading international teams with experience in California, United Kingdom, and India preferred
* Deep HR technical skills to manage the delivery of workforce plans, compensation & benefits strategies, employee relations and compliance issues and utilization of key data
* Based in Los Angeles and open to travel up to 50%
* Bachelors in Human Resources or relevant field, Masters highly preferred
* 10+ years in progressive leadership role within Human Resources, HR certification preferred
* Proven experience as a strategic consultant and coach to executives
* Experience working in various Human Capital platforms (ADP preferred)
* Knowledge of HR processes and procedures. Build out documentation of standard processes and procedures, and recommend new approaches where needed

Benefits

* Health and Wellness benefits including competitive medical, dental, and vision plans
* Performance-based bonuses and stock options
* Generous vacation and time off benefits including paid holidays
* Generally flexible working hours
* Working in a beautiful office space the heart of Silicon Beach in Playa Vista
* A collaborative culture where unconventional thinkers come together to solve interesting problems and having fun while doing it
* Mission-driven company that is making the world a better place

jobs.title: Head - Capacity Partnerships, Asia
jobs.description:
Description:

* Head of capacity partnerships in Asia will be responsible for building supply side of the platform for engineer.ai with Asian partners
* This role will lead a team that will tie up with capacity partners (software development companies) in Asia to drive a comprehensive engagement across supply & GTM
* The role will have a significant focus on driving supply side scale and strike appropriate margin deals.
* Role is based at Gurgaon, India.

Key areas of delivery:

* Ensuring supply is always ahead of demand on the platform
* Strike effective deals balancing on demand and on spot capacity
* Deliver high capacity partner NPS
* Drive depth of engagement across supply and GTM


6 months OKRs:

* TAT to start of project from Sales Order
* % of Human Network on Spot
** Avg Delta on Rack Rate of Skilled Professional

* Partner NPS
* % of 4 star partners - depth of engagement across 4 potential partnership opportunities.

Requirements

* Candidate should have experience of working in the software development ecosystem. Account management experience is preferred.
* Have significant knowledge of software development companies’ business model
* Should have strong C level network in the capacity partners organizations and be able to navigate thru organizational layers to drive decision making
* Good cross functional and external stakeholder management.
* Should have a broad understanding of business, cost structures and product prototypes
* Candidate should have managed a team of account management professionals across geographies

jobs.title: Head - Sales
jobs.description:
* Strong strategic sales leader with abilities to plan and implement sales driven programs to achieve regional sales goals
* Numbers driven person having shown acumen in the past of meeting good growth targets
* Deep understanding of the respective markets
* Comes with strong relationships in Enterprise segment
* Capable of striking partnerships in the respective region for SMBs and sector businesses
* Champion in driving growth strategies through sales in the region
* Experience in setting up sales business presence from scratch
* Good experience in software and cloud infrastructure selling process
* Manage the overall process of selling to all the customers in the region for Builder and CloudOps
* Have an effective network with the business ecosystem in the region
* Assisting Finance with Account Receivable escalations
* Generating cross sell & up sell opportunities


Job DESCRIPTION

* Own overall relationship with stakeholders in the region for business growth
* Engage with potential customers with support from internal stakeholders, including and not restricted to sales, finance, CPE, sales to manage sales closures
* Keep a track of targets and ensure cyclical delivery of targets every quarter
* Drive campaigns to ensure that pipeline is built and sustained
* Be a champion of our products and ensure the market understands the offering
* Establish oneself as a trusted / strategic advisor with stakeholders
* Support marketing in creation of marketing collaterals and lead generation activities
* Ensure growth of revenues by building relationships and adding value through research, consulting, etc.,
* Willingness to travel to locations for relationship meetings, events, pre-bids, meetings, etc.,

3, 6, 12 months OKRs:

* Sales plan for the region
* Lead generation
* Building an effective sales team in the respective region
* Sales Targets
** Meeting a minimum of 75% of the sales targets for the region

* Accuracy of sales plans

Requirements

* Prior experience in selling to Enterprise, SMBs as well as driving partnerships in software and cloud services
* Impeccable written and verbal communication skills
* Detail oriented and analytical and a problem solver
* Strong team player, proactive, self-motivated and a self-starter
* Thrives in a multitasking environment and can adjust priorities on-the-fly.
* 10 - 12 years of relevant experience
* Experience with ZOHO CRM or other CRM platforms
* Intent to help teams in their success
* Should have knowledge of responding to tenders having participated in bidding in the past
* Good cross organization and external stakeholder management skills

jobs.title: Head of Capacity Partnerships - Americas
jobs.description:
Why we need this role:

Head of capacity partnerships in Americas will help ensure that supply of creators and partners is always ahead of the demand on the platform in North and South America. This role will help us strike effective deals with capacity partners balancing on demand and on spot capacity. We need the role holder to build capacity partners into an effective go to market channel to drive projects from capacity partners. And to achieve all the key result areas drive partner NPS.


Why you should join?

This role will give you a chance to build a strong international supply network by aggregating hundreds of capacity partners and helping them increase business by driving depth of engagement. Thus this role will give you a strong experience for building a strong partner / supply side network as well as build a new go to market channel. You will be a part of the new business models that drive on aggregation of commoditized businesses and help you gain significant insights into the working of new and fast growing business model.


First 6 Months OKRs

1. Turn Around Time to start of project
2. Achieve Budgeted cost per project delivery
3. Partner NPS
4. % of partners converted as Go to market as well.


Requirements


* You have experience working in the software development ecosystem, particularly with Account Management experience.
* You have significant knowledge of software development companies’ business models
* Have a strong C level network in capacity partners organisations and are able to navigate through organizational layers to drive decision making.
* Any experience with software partners in Eastern Europe would be very desirable!
* You are particularly strong with cross-functional and external stakeholder management and have experience of managing account management teams across geographies.
* Passionate about loosely held values and ideas. We want someone who has experience of delivery and inside sales but is not fixated by the path already taken.

Benefits

* Health and Wellness benefits including competitive medical, dental, and vision plans
* Performance-based bonuses and stock options
* Generous vacation and time off benefits including paid holidays
* Generally flexible working hours
* Working in a beautiful office space the heart of Silicon Beach in Playa Vista
* A collaborative culture where unconventional thinkers come together to solve interesting problems and having fun while doing it
* Mission-driven company that is making the world a better place

  • Performance-based bonuses and stock options
  • Generous vacation and time off benefits including paid holidays
  • Generally flexible working hours
  • Working in a beautiful office space the heart of Silicon Beach in Playa Vista
  • A collaborative culture where unconventional thinkers come together to solve interesting problems and having fun while doing it

jobs.title: Head of Global Capacity Partnerships
jobs.description:
Why we need this role:

The Head of Global Capacity Partnerships will help ensure that supply of software developers and partners is always ahead of the demand on the platform. This role will help us strike effective deals with capacity partners (software development companies) to ensure we meet our budgeted cost for software development and delivery. We need the role holder to also build capacity partners into an effective go to market channel to drive projects from capacity partners. And to achieve all the key result areas drive partner NPS.


Why you should join?

This role will give you a chance to build a global supply network by aggregating hundreds of capacity partners and helping them increase business by driving depth of engagement. Thus this role will give you a strong experience for building a strong partner / supply side network as well as build a new go to market channel. You will be a part of the new business models that drive on aggregation of commoditised businesses and help you gain significant insights into the workings of new and fast growing business model.


First 6 Months OKRs

1. Turn Around Time to start of project
2. Achieve Budgeted cost per project delivery
3. Partner NPS
4. % of partners converted as Go to market as well.




Requirements

We would love to hear from you if:

* You have experience working in the software development ecosystem, particularly with Account Management experience.
* You have significant knowledge of software development companies’ business models
* Have a strong C level network in capacity partners organisations and are able to navigate through organizational layers to drive decision making.
* Any experience with software partners in Eastern Europe would be very desirable!
* You are particularly strong with cross-functional and external stakeholder management and have experience of managing account management teams across geographies.
* Passionate about loosely held values and ideas. We want someone who has experience of delivery and inside sales but is not fixated by the path already taken.

Benefits

* Health and Wellness benefits including competitive medical, dental, and vision plans- Coming soon!
* Performance-based bonuses and stock options
* Generally flexible working hours
* A collaborative culture where unconventional thinkers come together to solve interesting problems and having fun while doing it
* Mission-driven company that is making the world a better place

jobs.title: IT Infrastructure Manager
jobs.description:
The IT Infrastructure Manager will be a team leader that brings their own ideas to the table. This person would be responsible and accountable for making sure all of our systems are running smoothly within the limits of the specifications, costs and timelines. They must be well-versed and aware of all the industry best practices and processes. They must be detail-oriented and self-driven.


Why We Need This Role

Engineer.ai needs an experienced engineering manager to manage oversee IT staff and assist in recruitment and training. They’ll perform cost analysis between the London and India. They will ensure security and high-availability of our data and networks.


Why You Should Join

We are disrupting the software engineering industry, growing our global presence, and working with big-name partners to continue our rocket-like trajectory. This role not only gives you significant exposure to the inner-workings of the start-up scene, but it also is an opportunity to take your leadership skills to the next level.


First Six Month Deliverables

* Standardize equipment acquisition process: identify and vet vendors, create formal system for employee equipment requests
* Manage IT staff and assist in recruitment and training
* Optimize current conferencing system
* Design and develop systems and policies to ensure high availability of all office systems and tools
* Optimize UPS system to ensure zero downtime for the office
* Oversee infrastructure setup for new offices in London and India

Requirements


* Passionate about loosely held values and ideas. We want someone who has experience but is not blinded by the path already taken
* A strong drive and sense of ownership of the challenges we take on, coupled with a team-oriented, can-do attitude
* A systematic debugging and problem solving methodology
* Proven working experience as an IT manager or relevant experience
* Experience in network administration, installation and configuration
* Knowledge of technical management, information analysis, and various hardware/software systems
* A professional proficiency in English

Benefits


* Health and Wellness benefits including competitive medical, dental, and vision plans -*** Soon to be added***
* Performance-based bonuses and stock options
* 24 holidays + 8 bank holidays
* Generally flexible working hours
* Located in WeWork - Paddington
* A collaborative culture where unconventional thinkers come together to solve interesting problems and having fun while doing it
* Mission-driven company that is making the world a better place

jobs.title: Inside Sales Specialist
jobs.description:
Inside Sales Specialist

Dubai - UAE, Sales

DESCRIPTION

We are looking for a talented and competitive Inside Sales Representative that thrives in a quick sales cycle environment. An inside sales rep will play a fundamental role in achieving our ambitious customer acquisition and revenue growth objectives. You must be comfortable making dozens of calls per day, working with channel partners, generating interest, qualifying prospects and closing sales.

Roles & Responsibilities:

* Source new sales opportunities through extensive research (Jobsites/Google/Tools).
* Interacting with C-Level executives (CTO, CEO, Founders, and Presidents) through cold-calls and cold-emails.
* Maintain and expand your database of prospects.
* New client acquisition and help them understand the solutions available with the business.
* Assessing client requirements and route qualified opportunities to the appropriate sales executives / manager’s for further development and closure.
* Creating database of prospective clients and validating the information by understanding the requirements and proposing the right solutions.
* Building and maintaining strong relationships with all potential and existing clients.

Requirements

* Exceptional written, verbal, phone and presentation skills
* Full Time Graduate or Post graduate
* 0.6 - 2 years of experience in Sales (preferably B2B Sales)
* Self-motivated and driven to plan and execute sales generation
* Commitment to exceed targets
* Able to build good working relationships across all levels
* Able to work in a team and independently.

Benefits

Culture

Our culture is a cross between serious business and quirky startup; as we’ve grown from $0.5m to $13m in less than 4 years. We want team players, who roll up their sleeves, are open to being challenged and also understand the importance of respect, integrity and can that balance that with irreverence, cheekiness and a brand that aspires to do away with the taboo of being a “boring” software company.

The main reason people choose a career at engineer.ai is because of the work we do. With innovation at the heart of our business, the variety of work is continuous as we collaborate with our clients to explore new ways of creating high performance. This will give you endless opportunities to challenge yourself with interesting work. Another reason to join us is because our people enjoy working here. Engineer.ai is made up of diverse teams of highly motivated people who are committed to achieving outstanding results.

jobs.title: Junior Data Insights Analyst
jobs.description:
DESCRIPTION
Why we need this role

We are looking for a Junior Data Insights Analyst to join our newly established and fast-paced Growth team at a stage where you can really make a difference. We plan to run hundreds of paid social and paid campaigns globally as well as to increase our in-product conversion and k factor and we need someone to analyse data and provide actionable insights for the entire business.

Why you should join

This is an exciting opportunity to join a Growth team in its early stage - therefore we are looking for someone who thrives in a fast paced environment and is proactive and thinks outside the box. The Growth team is data-driven and results focused. We are seeking a talented professional who thrives at the intersection of data, product and performance marketing. This is an amazing opportunity for someone to dive into data sets and drive business decisions based on insights and help the business grow. You will have the chance to work across all departments, supporting the constant improvement of our product and overall business growth, as well as automating data pipelines and integrations.


First Six Month Deliverables / OKRs

-Establish A/B testing strategy
-Insights into lead re-/targeting
-Correct & reliable reporting

What will you be doing?

-Define and evaluate key metrics and understand what moves them and why
Owner of conceptualizing, developing, and maintaining dashboards and visualizations
-Communicate analyses and recommendations to cross functional stakeholders for decision making
-Partner with Engineering to improve data source quality
Own A/B testing and optimisation activities related to Growth and marketing <> sales funnel
-Communicate Results – Identify successes, failures, trends, and effectively communicate these findings to the organization. If test results are positive – analyze KPI improvements in pre/post A/B test roll-outs; if results are negative perform driver analysis to recommend next iteration of that test
-Explorative analysis i.e. how many pieces of content are consumed before a purchasing decision is made / which traffic sources convert at the highest rate and why / how does an event to purchase journey look like / how should we optimise geo targeting for trade shows
-Identify critical business problems and create analytical/modeling framework and solutions
-Translate complex findings and results into a compelling narrative

REQUIREMENTS

-At least 1 year experience in a similar role
-Advanced SQL and Tableau skills
-Experience in A/B and multivariate testing
-Have working experience with some of the following: Adstage, Google Ads, Facebook / Instagram Ads, LinkedIn Ads, Zoho/Hubspot, Salesforce
-Working experience with 3rd-party tracking vendors and integrating with social platforms.
-You will have the ability to interpret complex data sets and come up with actionable recommendations
-Good technical and analytical communication skills
-Commercially minded and always thinking of the customers' current and future needs
-You live and breathe data, and can use it to help teams make the right decisions
-Are excited by technology and will enjoy working in the fast pace of a start-up.
-Are passionate about loosely held values and ideas. We want someone who has experience but is not blinded by the path already taken.

jobs.title: Lead - Public Sector (Sales)
jobs.description:
Understand Engineer.ai offerings in detail
Understand the sales strategies and selling to public sector
Champion in driving growth strategies through sales
Experience in setting up the public sector business from scratch
Relevant experience in responding to Government and Public Sector Undertaking’s (PSU) tenders
Understand the tendering process with regard to Govt. and PSU business
Manage the overall process of selling to public sector business
Have an effective network with the public sector stakeholders including Central, State Governments and PSUs
Engage with partners to respond to tenders as well as work with Government requirements for software development and cloud
Assisting Finance with Account Receivable escalations
Generating cross sell & up sell opportunities with public sector business
Reporting: To the CBO, MENA

Own overall relationship with public sector business for growth of the business
Coordinate with internal stakeholders, including and not restricted to sales, finance, CPE, Sales to manage queries and provide quality responses
Keep a track of tenders directly as well as through partners
Ensure all the queries are responded to for participating in tenders
Establish oneself as a trusted / strategic advisor with stakeholders in public sector
Support marketing in creation of marketing collaterals and lead generation activities
Ensure growth of revenues of public sector by building relationships and adding value through research, consulting, etc.,
Willingness to travel to locations for relationship meetings, events, pre-bids, meetings, etc.,

jobs.title: Lead UX/UI Designer
jobs.description:
We are building a Design Studio for our team as our company continues to build technology experiences for both consumer and business to business products.
We need free thinkers who are motivated, have an eye for detail and are willing to go beyond the ordinary; pushing conventional thinking. At the same time, we need artists that have an appreciation for interaction, growth mechanics and consumer/user behavior design. Finally we need team players who also understand the limits of what rationally can be delivered through engineering.

SD Squared has a set of consumer products both in the wearable (Rebecca Minkoff Notification Bracelet) and Mobile App Space (Shoto - an easy way to pool photos from friends and family) & a strong Engineering Service that is building more and more applications and technology for our customers.

Our Design Studio will manage three areas of work, come back with ideas on what to build basis feedback from the Company worldwide, design for customer needs and design for needs of our own products and services.

We feel Design is the center of our universe, and this is our first deep foray in to building out a practice that let's us build better products, that are more engaging and generating greater value to the World around us.

jobs.title: Manager Sales - Dubai
jobs.description:
Manager-Sales (GCC Region)

Dubai - UAE

DESCRIPTION

* Responsible for devising/ updating the sales models in collaboration with regional Business managers.
* Maintaining a thorough understanding of the clients industry, including industry trends, industry business processes, industry financial measurements and performance indicators, and key client competitors in their industry.
* Pitching CXOs of potential organizations, collaborating to increase the volume of business and exploring new methodologies to take the organization to the next level.
* Defining marketing strategies and customer interaction model for the PAN India corporate sales function
* To build annual sales to then convert into quarterly and monthly operational plans and develop, on a regional scale, sales targets and volume goals.
* To monitor the monthly/quarterly sales achievement vs Targets (primary/secondary). Analyze the sales figures and take corrective action in case of non-achievement of targets.

OKRs - In the first 6 months you will be responsible for:

* Develop a 90 – 120 day plan for sales and marketing for launching sales operations in GCC market
* Set targets for the market and strive to achieve targets
* Build technical expertise to understand the cloud and engineering offerings of Engineer.ai.
* Play a key role in launching new products and offers in the market
* Leverage relationships to dig out opportunities with companies in GCC region and work with the leadership team to participate and bid for business
* Report on a daily / weekly basis to the reporting manager on state of business and sales initiatives

Requirements


We are looking for a versatile & out of box innovator who formulate strategies to increase the volume of business. The incumbent must be seasoned into Cloud Computing sales with strong expertise into interaction with CEOs of potential organizations.

Excellent interpersonal skills and a natural flair for associating and connecting with people at all levels.

Must have strong business acumen to spearhead the sales and business development function within GCC region.

Benefits

The main reason people choose a career at www.engineer.ai (https://workable.com/nr?l=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.engineer.ai%2F) is because of the work we do with innovation at the heart of our business, the variety of work is continuous as we collaborate with our clients to explore new ways of creating high performance. This will give you endless opportunities to challenge yourself with interesting work.

Another reason to join us is because our people enjoy working here. Engineer.ai is made up of diverse teams of highly motivated people who are committed to achieving outstanding results.

Another reason to join us is because our people enjoy working here. Engineer.ai is made up of diverse teams of highly motivated people who are committed to achieving outstanding results.

jobs.title: Mid-level Engineer
jobs.description:
Who we are

At Engineer.ai we believe that anyone, irrespective of technical knowledge, should be able to build and operate technology. We make software accessible to everyone.

We are an AI-assisted platform building, maintaining and running bespoke software for our customers, making it faster, more accessible and less expensive for everyone to bring their ideas to life. 

We launched in 2012, and last year we secured $29.5m of funding to scale our growth in Europe. We already have three offices in LA, Delhi, and London and recently hit 250 employees globally. A key focus for us this year is to significantly grow our London operation. 

Why we need this role

BuilderCloud is a pillar of our business that focuses on provisioning, running and scaling the infrastructure that a customer’s idea is going to need to run on, at the best possible price for them. In order to rapidly expand our product offerings in this area, we would like to significantly expand our London engineering team. We are looking to hire engineers to work on areas such as intelligent cloud provider agnostic infrastructure usage analytics, secondary infrastructure marketplaces, interactive billing reports, devops automation tools and more.


What we need

BuilderCloud is the pillar of our business that focuses on provisioning, running and scaling the infrastructure a customer’s idea is going to need at the best possible price for them. We are rapidly expanding our product offerings in this area and are building a London based technical team to do so. 
 
If you’re a developer that ticks some or all of these boxes, we’d love to hear from you:

You have experience with Ruby/Rails or similar language/framework stacks.
Passionate about code quality, automated tests and continuous integration/delivery.
Enthusiastic about getting stuck in and taking on new challenges
 
 
What you’ll be doing in your first 6 months
 
Working in 2 week sprints to deliver new microservices as part of your scrum team
Writing performant, testable and stable Ruby/Rails code
Helping to unblock and coach junior team members
 
 
Our Tech Stack
 
Our in house platform teams work with a variety of technologies that’ll you’ll get to play with. Experience in some would be an advantage but is not strictly necessary. Most important is using the right tool for the job so we’re always evaluating what tech makes the most sense and we’d love for you to have some input in this.
 
Latest stable versions of Ruby/Rails (2.6 and 6.0 at time of writing)
Docker and Kubernetes
Git & GitLab
Python
Postgres, MySQL, Redis
AWS, Azure, GCP, Digital Ocean
 

What you get in return
A supportive team and a fun relaxed work environment
Health and wellness benefits
Performance-based bonuses and stock options
Generally flexible working hours
Working in a modern office space in the heart of Paddington






    Want to know more?
https://youtu.be/xbkT0mE_V3Q

jobs.title: Mobile Developer - iOS
jobs.description:
We’re looking for humble, but ambitious, razor-sharp Software Engineer, mobile who can teach us a thing or two. We promise to return the favor. Like us, you take product development, UX research and platform engineering seriously; you’re passionate about technology. We embrace those who see things differently, aren’t afraid to experiment, and who have a healthy disregard for constraints. That’s where you come in. Our selection process will emphasize hands on engineering. The ideal candidate must be a master of their domain and be able to contribute as an individual contributor (software engineer and architect).


Why We Need This Role

We are looking for a mobile software engineer to help us develop platform to generate mobile apps for iOS. The industry is in a constant state of flux; tools and frameworks change by the month and so we are looking for someone who is not afraid to learn on the job, and who can take the initiative to identify and implement novel solutions


Why You Should Join

This is a challenging and diverse role that requires you to build both, a new generation of Builder Solution product, from the ground up. Only join this role if you are craving rapid growth, able to create a path in uncharted territory, and comfortable with trying, failing and course-correcting fast.


First Six Month Deliverables

* Collaborate with designers, product managers, and other software developers to deliver compelling products or enterprise wide integrations
* As a part of the engineering scrum team, contribute to the architecture of efficient and reusable components that drive complex applications across the stack
* Build frameworks enabling us to create mobile apps
* Identify and resolve functional, performance and scalability issues

Requirements

Passionate about loosely held values and ideas. We want someone who has experience but is not blinded by the path already taken.

* 4+ years or more iOS (Swift) development experience
* CS degree required or equivalent work experience
* Outstanding communication skills, both written and oral
* Strong understanding of and experience with testing practices

Benefits

* Health and Wellness benefits including competitive medical, dental, and vision plans
* Performance-based bonuses and stock options
* Generous vacation and time off benefits including paid holidays
* Generally flexible working hours
* Working in a beautiful office space the heart of Silicon Beach in Playa Vista
* A collaborative culture where unconventional thinkers come together to solve interesting problems and having fun while doing it
* Mission-driven company that is making the world a better place

jobs.title: Partner Development Manager
jobs.description:
Partner Development Manager

Gurugram, Haryana, India · Delivery


DESCRIPTION

We are looking for a versatile & out of box innovator to help us build and manage the supply side of the platform for engineer.ai. We are on an ambitious pursuit the build the largest distributing engineering team in the world, you would tie up with capacity partners (software development companies) to drive a comprehensive engagement across supply & GTM.

Key areas of delivery:

* Ensuring supply is always ahead of demand on the platform
* Build the incentive and control models to ensure availability, quality and productivity of partner teams
* Deliver high capacity partner NPS
* Drive depth of engagement across supply and GTM

REQUIREMENTS
* Candidate should have experience of working in the software development ecosystem. Account management experience is preferred.
* Have significant knowledge of software development companies’ business model.
* Good cross functional and external stakeholder management skills.
* Should have a broad understanding of business, cost structures and product prototype

Why You Should Join

Our culture is a cross between serious business and quirky startup; as we’ve grown from $0.5m to $45m in less than 4 years. We want team players who roll up their sleeves, are open to being challenged and also understand the importance of respect, integrity and can that balance that with irreverence, cheekiness and a brand that aspires to do away with the taboo of being a “boring” software company. Most importantly, any role in Engineer.ai is like joining our family.

jobs.title: Performance Marketing Manager
jobs.description:
Why we need this role

We are looking for a Performance Marketing Manager to join our newly established and fast-paced Growth team at a stage where you can really make a difference. We plan to run hundreds of campaigns globally and we want to create an in-house team who will manage and automate our campaigns. We need someone who is able to create a predictable and scalable digital customer acquisition machine. Your work will have a huge impact on the way the company hits its growth targets. If you are someone who thrives at the intersection of data, product and performance marketing, you will love this role.


First Six Month Deliverables / OKRs

* x leads from paid acquisition
* Contact => MQL conversion
* ROAS per channel of x



What will you be doing?

* Managing large Paid Search and/or Social campaigns (Adwords, Facebook, Bing) spanning multiple markets and languages, from conception to execution.
* Work with a team of world-class developers to automate marketing processes and scale up our campaigns (scripts, in-house solutions).
* Be responsible for updating reports and provide analysis around ROI, campaign performance, conversion patterns and website traffic to optimise all campaigns
* Analyse performance and understand the details and effectiveness of each campaign.
* Driving independent optimisation plans through analysis of data sets.
* Localise campaign approach based on day to day market observation and in line with local brand campaigns and promotions.
* Adopt a continual ‘test and learn’ approach to all performance marketing activities.
* Become involved in other adhoc Performance Marketing projects as necessary.

About you:

* You have proven experience in paid social and/ or ppc.
* You have managed junior team members in the past and are excited about growing a team- you will need to hire an Executive straight away!
* Experience in the B2B space / Saas would be ideal, however we are flexible.
* Have experience with some of the following: Adstage, Google Ads, Facebook / Instagram Ads, LinkedIn Ads, Zoho/Hubspot, Tableau
* Have familiarity with 3rd-party tracking vendors and integrating with social platforms.
* Are confident with presenting and working in an international environment with various stakeholders
* Have the ability to effectively resolve problems and/or roadblocks as they occur, and know when to escalate
* You are excited by technology and will enjoy working in the fast pace of a start-up.
* You are passionate about loosely held values and ideas. We want someone who has experience but is not blinded by the path already taken.

Benefits


* Performance-based bonuses
* Generally flexible working hours
* COMING SOON- Health and Wellness benefits including competitive medical, dental, and vision plans
* A collaborative culture where unconventional thinkers come together to solve interesting problems and having fun while doing it
* Mission-driven company that is making the world a better place

jobs.title: Performance Tester
jobs.description:
Responsibility :

* To be responsible for testing the performance of APIs, DB calls(SQL and NoSQL) and UI.
* To be responsible for performance testing, stress testing, spike testing, volume-based testing, endurance testing, and load testing.
* Understand business use cases, internal/external performance Benchmarks, debug performance issues, design performance testing framework, decision making on issues, technical assistance in performance analysis and performance tuning of DB/OS/APIs.
* Create JMeter scripts using groovy/BeanShell to test the performance of applications.
* Identify hardware and software bottlenecks in the application and raise them to the Infrastructure and Development Team.
* Work with cross-functional team members from Architecture, Product Strategy & Development, QA, Sales & Services, and other central teams to improve performance and scalability of multiple products.
* Review and participate in product benchmarking and design reviews of multiple products to provide early feedback into the design of products.
* Test API and UI performance of new or updated APIs/UI within the sprint along with manual and automation testers.
* Prepare Performance Comparison Report for APIs/UI (before and after the code changes) and share the report with the stakeholders along with Test Summary Report.
* Manage JMeter scripts through the git repository.
* Integrate JMeter Test Plan with Jenkins CI/CD pipeline.
* Run JMeter scripts through Jenkins Daily and analyze the response time and performance issues daily along with Dev and Infrastructure Team.
* Create Performance Metrics report for each release
* Work closely with QA and PM team members to understand performance requirements and provide a strong performance service.
* Provides regular performance reports on test progress, anomalies, risks and issues associated with project testing.




Requirements

* 3-6 Years of relevant experience in Performance Testing
* A deep understanding of performance testing methodologies like performance testing guidelines for cloud-native, Web and Java Applications
* Must have hands-on experience in performance testing tools such as JMeter/Gatling, gafana,GT metrix, chrome performance developer tools.
* Experience in performance analysis at different layers of application development such as database tuning, JAVA tuning, and UI tuning.
* Experience with Linux/Unix operating systems
* Experience in working on cloud platforms such as AWS/Google Cloud/Windows Azure.
* Hands on experience in autoscaling and load balancers.
* Experience in working on monitoring tools such as New Relic/Splunk/App Dynamics.
* Should be able to extrapolate performance testing results and provide proper production capacity sizing for the application scaling.
* Experience with performance monitoring tools and understanding performance metrics
* Knowledge of Multithreading concepts, Indexing concepts, heap concepts, stack overflow concepts, Lazy loading, and Compression concepts.
* Experience in SQL, database tuning, capacity planning based on the performance of the application.
* Hands of experience in shell/ Perl scripting.

Benefits

Engineer.ai is an online platform for building software using AI & a marketplace of teams. Builder takes care of everything from idea to app and CloudOps ensures that your idea stays healthy and operates efficiently in the Cloud. Engineer.ai’s vision is to be the #1 way to Build Software and ultimately to be the connect between every idea and product; helping everyone who wants to engage in technology without needing to know how to build it.
